title: Water the plants
description: Give all the indoor plants a good soak

title: Write a grocery list
description: Check the fridge and pantry to see what needs to be restocked

title: Clean the bathroom
description: Scrub the sink, toilet, and shower

title: Fix the leaky faucet
description: Need to tighten the loose handle or replace the washer

title: Pay the electricity bill
description: Log in to the online portal or mail a check

title: Call mom for her birthday
description: Don't forget to wish her a happy birthday!

title: Go for a walk
description: Get some fresh air and exercise

title: Organize the desk
description: Clear away clutter and put things where they belong

title: Vacuum the living room
description: Pick up crumbs and dust bunnies

title: Mow the lawn
description: Keep the grass trimmed and neat
